dt2.14:1.1.pli: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.14:1.2.pli: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:1.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:2.6.pli: manindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.14:2.7.pli: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:2.9.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:3.5.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:3.7.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:4.8.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:4.10.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi, ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:5.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:5.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:6.5.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:7.8.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:8.7.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:9.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:60.4.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:60.6.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:61.4.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:61.6.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:62.6.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:62.8.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:63.5.pli: araṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.14:63.6.pli: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:63.8.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:1.4.pli: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?

dt2.2:1.5.pli: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:2.7.pli: manoviññāṇadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.2:2.8.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:3.7.pli: purisindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.2:3.8.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:4.2.pli: ekavokārabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.2:4.3.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi tīhāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:5.2.pli: sanidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.2:5.3.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:6.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.2:6.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:7.1.pli: Sanidassanehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.2:7.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.2:8.2.pli: upādādhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?

dt2.2:8.3.pli: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
